sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) When piloting a ship or vehicle, the character may take the Full Stop maneuver to immediately reduce the speed of the ship or vehicle to zero. The ship or vehicle then suffers one point of system strain for every point of speed it had before stopping.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Full Stop</name> <number>TAL0001240</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-31 20:51:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1a6361482f98e050e0f497eef699b610</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-31 20:51:49</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
